DOC.brief_title: Standard ACL Reconstruction v ACL + Lateral Extra-Articular Tenodesis Study
DOC.detailed_description: This study pragmatic study parallel group , randomize clinical trial 600 patient anterior cruciate ligament insufficiency undergo surgery , randomly allocate either ACL reconstruction alone ( control ) ACL reconstruction lateral extra-articular tenodesis ( experimental ) . Surgeons , data collector , data analyst blind group allocation . The primary outcome rate failure . Secondary outcome include disease specific quality life , return function sport . Patients follow two year postoperative .
